1104105907770806273.text: if you as a creator are frustrated with how the media currently covers youtube, may I humbly suggest talking to journalists? we *want* to know what you care about, what interests you, what you think about the field. my DMs are open and so are @loudmouthjulia's

1104102532866064384.text: many of us enjoy YT and have creators we regularly follow. we want to write interesting things about them. trust me, writing a million stories about how logan paul did something terrible again is frustrating and unfulfilling for us too. we have to talk about it when it matters

1104101290865500160.text: 100 percent agree with some of this, but also — there are ABSOLUTELY journalists out there who are working to bridge the literacy gap between YT and a mainstream audience. many of us who actively cover YT don't hate creators or view them as threats to our jobshttps://twitter.com/hankgreen/status/1104098591843397633 …
